Package xyz.xenondevs.invui.window

Interface AnvilWindow.Builder.Split

All Superinterfaces:
AnvilWindow.Builder<AnvilWindow.Builder.Split>, Cloneable, Window.Builder<AnvilWindow,AnvilWindow.Builder.Split>, Window.Builder.Double<AnvilWindow,AnvilWindow.Builder.Split>
Enclosing interface:
AnvilWindow.Builder<S extends AnvilWindow.Builder<S>>
public static interface AnvilWindow.Builder.Split extends AnvilWindow.Builder<AnvilWindow.Builder.Split>, Window.Builder.Double<AnvilWindow,AnvilWindow.Builder.Split>
A split AnvilWindow builder. Combines both AnvilWindow.Builder and Window.Builder.Double for an AnvilWindow with two Guis, where the lower Gui is used to fill the Player's inventory.
See Also:
  • Window.Builder.Normal.Split
  • CartographyWindow.Builder.Split
